title: ジャパンCの後に・心軽やかに

text.jpText:
誰よりも走ることが好きなアイネスフウジン。
そんな彼女が海外勢もしのぎを削る
『ジャパンカップ』の1着を見事に飾った。
text.enText:
Aines Fuujin loves to run more than anyone 
else. She was the first runner-up in the 
"Japan Cup," in which even foreign 
competitors were competing. She was the first 
runner-up in the "Japan Cup," a race in which 
foreign competitors also competed.

text.jpText:
『アイネス・コール』に盛り上がるレース場。
アイネスフウジンも真っすぐに応える。
text.enText:
The racecourse is abuzz with excitement over 
the "Ines Call. Ines Fuujin also responds 
straight away.

text.jpText:
家族、仲間、ファン。誰もが彼女に夢を見た。
そしてアイネスフウジンこそが、
その夢を誰よりも楽しんでいた……。
text.enText:
Family, friends, fans. Everyone dreamed of 
her. And Aines Fouzin was the one who enjoyed 
that dream more than anyone else. enjoyed 
that dream more than anyone else. ……
